T02D2873:215b-1: tsakra au pa de sha n'a ma /
T02D2873:215b-3: 'khor lo'i man ngag ces bya ba /
T02D2873:215b-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2873:215b-5: rnal 'byor sngon du bsnyen byas pas //
T02D2873:215b-6: drag po'i las la sbyar bya ste //
T02D2873:215b-7: las sbyor cis kyang ma thul na//
T02D2873:215b-9: sbyor ba 'di la zhugs gyur na //
T02D2873:215b-10: brlag par 'gyur te the tshom med //
T02D2873:215b-12: ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshon yin te //
T02D2873:215b-13: rtse gcig bsgoms pas 'grub pa las //
T02D2873:215b-14: kun gyis 'grub par mi nus so //
T02D2873:215b-18: 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi //
T02D2873:215b-19: sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs brtol nas //
T02D2873:215b-21: myur du bsgrims te bsgral ba na //
T02D2873:215b-23: bsgrub bya'i rnam shes smos ci dgos //
T02D2873:215b-25: sga tsha thal chen grog mo'i zhing //
T02D2873:215b-26: bong bu'i spangs dang sa gnyan las //
T02D2873:215b-27: klu rigs rnams kyi gzugs bya ste //
T02D2873:215b-28: snying po ti dang ming bcug la //
T02D2873:215b-29: dgug pa'i dgongs pa 'di ltar bya //
T02D2873:216a-2: dza: las lcags kyu'i dbyibs byung nas //
T02D2873:216a-3: bsgrub bya'i rnam shes bkug par bsam //
T02D2873:216a-4: khugs nas sgrub pa'i las la 'jug / de nas gsad pa'i 'khor lo brtsams //
T02D2873:216a-5: stong nyid dang las ae las ni //
T02D2873:216a-6: mthing ga gru gsum chos 'byung dbus //
T02D2873:216a-7: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D2873:216a-8: ram las me ri lnga yi dbus //
T02D2873:216a-11: bh'um las srid pa'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D2873:216a-12: spu gri gcod pa'i 'khor lo bskyed //
T02D2873:216a-14: me 'bar dpal dang bcas par bsam //
T02D2873:216a-16: rdo rje ra ba'i 'khor lo bsgom //
T02D2873:216a-17: raksha zhes pas steng srung ba'i //
T02D2873:216a-18: byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'khor lo bskyed //
T02D2873:216a-19: h'um rnams las ni bde gshegs sku //
T02D2873:216a-20: cho ga yan lag gsum gyis bskyed //
T02D2873:216a-21: thugs kar ye shes 'khor lo bsgom //
T02D2873:216a-22: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka ru //
T02D2873:216a-23: nyi stengs dpa' po 'bru lnga dgod //
T02D2873:216a-24: mu khyud rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskor //
T02D2873:216a-25: bde gshegs bka' dang dam tshig las //
T02D2873:216a-27: zil gyis mnan pa'i sngags rnams dgod //
T02D2873:216a-28: phyogs mtshams mtshon cha'i 'khor lo la //
T02D2873:216a-29: gnad la dbab pa'i sngags rnams dgod //
T02D2873:216a-30: rdo rje srid pa'i 'khor lo la //
T02D2873:216a-31: tshar bcad pa yi sngags rnams bsam //
T02D2873:216a-32: byin rlabs srung ba'i 'khor lo'i dbus //
T02D2873:216a-33: mi bskyod zhe sdang rdo rje ste //
T02D2873:216a-34: mthing nag sdigs mdzub rdo rje bcas //
T02D2873:216a-35: sems dpa'i skyil krung nyi zla'i gdan //
T02D2873:216a-36: 'khor lo yi ni rtsibs dag la //
T02D2873:216a-37: bcom ldan gtum po khros pa'i sku //
T02D2873:216a-38: rdo rje dang ni sdigs mdzub bcas //
T02D2873:216a-39: zhal nas sngags kyi sgra sgrogs pas //
T02D2873:216a-41: de ltar 'khor lo chen po bsgoms //
T02D2873:216a-42: ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs te //
T02D2873:216a-43: mchod bstod sdig bshags la sogs bya //
T02D2873:216a-44: phyag rgya bzhi yis de la bstim //
T02D2873:216a-45: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2873:216a-46: rjes su gnang ba gsum ldan gyis //
T02D2873:216a-47: chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur te //
T02D2873:216a-50: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs dam bskul //
T02D2873:216b-0: de las 'od 'phros @216b sngags la phog / sngags las 'od 'phros 'khor lo bskul //
T02D2873:216b-3: thub cing rab tu bsreg par bsam //
T02D2873:216b-4: bdag nyid kyis ni sngags bzlas pas //
T02D2873:216b-5: sngags kyi 'khor lo rim par bskor //
T02D2873:216b-6: gzas pa po yi snying ga ru //
T02D2873:216b-7: ya yis bskyod de h'um gis bsdu //
T02D2873:216b-8: phat kyis rnam par 'thor zhing bsregs //
T02D2873:216b-9: srid pa rdo rje'i 'khor los gtub //
T02D2873:216b-10: phyogs mtshams mtshon cha'i 'khor lo yis //
T02D2873:216b-11: phog na thams cad brlag par 'gyur //
T02D2873:216b-12: tsitta thugs kyi sgrub pa ste //
T02D2873:216b-13: shin tu gnod na khong du bskor //
T02D2873:216b-14: 'phral du gsod na rten la bskor //
T02D2873:216b-15: skabs su gnod na dgug cing bskor //
T02D2873:216b-16: bskor nas brlag par gdon mi za //
T02D2873:216b-18: gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig sngags dang //
T02D2873:216b-19: byad dang bka' nyan pho nya dang //
T02D2873:216b-21: gnod sbyor thams cad 'jig byed cing //
T02D2873:216b-22: gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcod //
T02D2873:216b-23: rig sngags drag po'i gzungs sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba /
T02D2873:216b-24: slob dpon su b'a g'i shva ra k'i rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2873:216b-26: // / rgya bod gnyis la grags par gyur pa yi //
T02D2873:216b-27: mdo sngags don la mkhas pa'i d'i pam ka ra la //
T02D2873:216b-28: sgra sgyur bod na mkhas pa'i rgyal po brtson seng gis //
